review_title: Great job within the medical field
pros: Established Facility with-in large corporation that provides stability. Rewards hard work and dedication with raises and opportunities for growth. Great coworkers that pitch in wherever they can. Admin/management that listens and understands the industry.
cons: Being a rural hospital has some disadvantages, staffing can be tough and with a smaller overall staff, covering holidays/call can be tricky.

job_title: PCT Patient Care Tech in Nacogdoches, TX
cons: Not the best new hire training.

pros: People are great to work woth
cons: Overworked and stretched thin with job duties

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Nacogdoches, TX
pros: Team atmosphere, wry helpful and courteous staff
cons: Heavy patient loads at times, as part time staff you get called off a lot due to use of traveling nurses

job_title: Certified Pharmacy Technician PRN in Nacogdoches, TX
pros: Everyone is friendly, good pay, little experience needed

review_title: Not enough people, not enough proper training
pros: Good people and decent benefits. Coworkers will help you despite it taking from their own work.
cons:
Short staffing. Can not get things completed in the correct manner without the people to do  so. New people are being trained by those on their way out, which leads to inefficiency and holes in your training. Directors are not involved or are too distantly involved in the quality of the training that new hires receive; so they expect perfection out of someone who wasn't trained enough or wasn't properly trained before they are sent out on their own. Director does not understand that they need to re-evaluate their work flow and cut out redundancies to make the work less stressful and more efficient for the staff that they have.

No room for advancement. Many hours staying over and away from family. Did not fill the role I was hired for.

pros: Pharmacy department is like a family. Most of the staff has worked there for well over ten years, some over twenty.
cons: You are kept VERY busy. There is no "fat" in staffing. You have to do a lot of multitasking.

job_title: Senior Maintenance Technician in Nacogdoches, TX
pros: Director is very good, benefits are good, most of the workers are very nice.
cons: Pay scale low in east Texas and distance from family.
